name: Savory Sausage, Cheese and Oat Muffins
author: Niki
summary: A low fat, vegetarian and hearty muffin that is wonderful for breakfast, brunch or snacks.
ingredients: 3  meatless breakfast patties, cooked and crumbled
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease a 12 cup muffin tin, or line with paper liners
In a large bowl, stir together the flour, oats, baking powder, baking soda, salt, garlic powder, and onion powder
In a separate bowl, mix together the melted margarine, egg substitute, and buttermilk
Add the wet ingredients to the dry, and mix until just blended
Fold in the crumbled patties and Parmesan cheese
Spoon into the prepared muffin cups
Bake for 8 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top springs back when lightly touched
Cool in muffin tins on a wire rack
